MonsterTrait.Name: Source
MonsterTrait.Text: Tales from the Yawning Portal, page 248

MonsterTrait.Name: Amorphous Form
MonsterTrait.Text: White Maw can occupy another creature's space and vice versa.

MonsterTrait.Name: Corrode Metal
MonsterTrait.Text: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits White Maw corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits White Maw is destroyed after dealing damage. White Maw can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

MonsterTrait.Name: False Appearance
MonsterTrait.Text: While White Maw remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from white stone.

MonsterTrait.Name: Killer Response
MonsterTrait.Text: Any creature that starts its turn in White Maw's space is targeted by a pseudopod attack if White Maw isn't incapacitated.

MonsterAction.Name: Pseudopod
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.
